name: Boom-Shaka-Laka!
description:
You find yourself behind enemy lines. Arena made of steel structures and destructible boxes. You are a miner. The weapons that matter are bombs. Enemy soldiers are patrolling around. Some will persistently follow you and may interrupt your game. The main task is to destroy all enemies and find the key to move to the next level.

Boom-Shaka-Laka! - is a modern arena-game with a classic twist. Place bombs with a timer. Collect upgrades. Look for a move to the next level.

Game features:
- Maze-like maps
- Soundtrack
- Upgrades system
